m_szDocTitle: Mobile robot with a head-based movement mapping scheme - InTouch Technologies, Inc.
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Mobile robot with a head-based movement mapping scheme United States Patent 8983174 Abstract: A robotic system that includes a mobile robot and a remote input device. The input device may be a joystick that is used to move a camera and a mobile platform of the robot. The system may operate in a mode where the mobile platform moves in a camera reference coordinate system. The camera reference coordinate system is fixed to a viewing image provided by the camera so that movement of the robot corresponds to a direction viewed on a screen. This prevents disorientati
